name: Susan Feniger's Street Food's Spicy Yuzu Mayonnaise
description: This tangy Yuzu Mayonnaise from Susan Feniger's Street Food enhances the salty, briny flavors in her Tatsutage Fried Chicken, but it pairs equally well with a warm summer tomato and a couple slices of bacon on a BLT.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the mayonnaise, yuzu juice, and chili paste in a small bowl and whisk together until well incorporated. Store the mayonnaise in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks.
